events.name: Talk for SP Engineering students by Dr. Loo (SIT-DP SEEMS)
events.description:
The Bachelor of Engineering with Honours in Systems Engineering (ElectroMechanical Systems) ‚Äî or SEEMS ‚Äî is a multi-disciplinary degree program that brings together the fields of mechanical, electrical,¬†and computer engineering with a holistic approach to system development. SEEMS looks at the design, analysis, development, and life-cycle management of complex interconnected systems with a broad range of applications. Its methodologies address real-world complexities, such as uncertainty, constraints, multiple objectives, and interactions among various parts or subsystems that constitute the whole.
Learn about SIT-DigiPen's rigorous curriculum that prepares students for this industry.Get an insight about the different career options available as well.¬†
events.location: LT6B, SIT@SP Building, 510 Dover Road, Level 6, Singapore 139660

events.name: TechLadies Study CS50 - 17 May
events.description:
Join us in this women-only study group to learn computer science! While there will be one or two mentors to answer any technical questions you have, you need to be self-reliant as much as possible as this is not a workshop. 

In this study group, we are taking the course, HarvardX: CS50 Introduction to Computer Science, on edX together. As long as you are taking this course, please join us even if you're just getting started! üë©üèª‚Äçüíª üí™

To join in this study group, please:

1. Create an account on edX and enroll into the course at this link: https://courses.edx.org/courses/course-v1:HarvardX+CS50+X/info

2. Start from Week 0 or continue where you've left off. As the free wifi we are tapping on at the cafes might sometimes not be that great, do watch the lecture videos before you come. 

Bring your fully charged laptop and we'll see you soon!

Note: Please buy something at the cafe as we're merely crashing that cafe. We don't want to be kicked out! We're trying out different cafes in search for the most ideal place (spacious, good wifi, convenient location). Until the search is over, do be prepared to tether from your phone when we meet.

Psst! This study group is for women only. :)
events.location: The Daily Roundup, 1 Keong Saik Road #01-02, Singapore 089109

events.name: Kx Meetup with Kx Labs Chief Scientist Dave Thomas
events.description: Hi All, Dave Thomas, Chief Scientist/CSO at Kx, will be in Singapore next week and we would like to invite you for an informal evening on Wednesday the 17th of May. Time: TBC This will be an opportunity to hear from Dave about the Kx 4.0 platform features, RD in text graphs, kdb+ outside of finance and what to expect from Kx in the near future.¬† As you may be aware, Dave Thomas engages with tech experts and companies globally and has a pool of knowledge and experience.¬†This informal evening will provide you with an opportunity to ask Dave your questions and to share your challenges with him. We hope to see you all there! Kx Community Singapore
events.location: Overeasy, One Fullerton, #01-06, 1 Fullerton Road S049213, Singapore

events.name: Deep Learning @ ReFUEL4
events.description: And we have double meetup in May! In this meetup, we have Chiu Hansheng, Head of Data, from ReFUEL4 to share more with us on using deep learning in online advertising. (https://www.linkedin.com/in/hschiu/) Here are the details: ReFUEL4 is the world's first crowdsourcing platform for ad development, built on the Facebook and Instagram APIs. Using a pay-for-performance model, ReFUEL4's base of more than 10,000 designers can create static and video ads in a matter of hours to sustain campaign performance. Using artificial intelligence, ReFUEL4 provides partners and designers live campaign data that guides the further development of ads. Advertising will never be the same! Synopsis - ReFUEL4 Introduction: What we do and how we are changing the advertising industry.- How we are utilizing deep learning: Problems, difficulties, and solutions. Given mixed kinds of input, how we created sensible classifiers and its performance in real production environment.- Generative models are gaining attentions, how it will help us in shaping future advertising. RSVP Starts at May 12, 2017 Friday 12:00pm Ends at May 16, 2017 Tuesday 10:30pm
events.location: Funan Show Suite, High St, Singapore
